mapper.insert: insert into memberRoomAttendance values(#{room_no}, #{member_no}, now(), null, null, 1)
mapper.select: select * from memberRoomAttendance where attendance_room_no = #{room_no} and attendance_member_no = #{member_no}
mapper.update: update memberRoomAttendance set attendance_study_end_time = now(), attendance_study_time = #{study_time} where attendance_room_no = #{room_no} and attendance_member_no = #{member_no}
mapper.delete: delete from memberRoomAttendance where attendance_member_no = #{member_no} and attendance_room_no = #{room_no}
